discourse_list.title: Need help with possible liquidation and eth/peth

content.content: I think my CDP was liquidated as when I go to the CDP portal it shows i have no CDP and my eth balance is zero. I shouldn’t have been totally liquidated and when I enter my address at ethview it shows I have a peth balance but there’s no peth showing. I’m not clear on peth. How do I access it and can I convert it to eth?

Did you figure this out? peth is wroth 5 percent more than eth and you can convert peth to weth and then eth.  I think this is all in the dev docs, which could be an issue. But try this interface, if you don’t do command line: https://sai.makerdao.com/
